---
title: "Individual Sample Reports"
output: pdf_document
params:
    sample_id: NA
    phenotype: NA
    frares: NULL
    outres: NULL
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(OUTRIDER)
library(FRASER)
```

```{r outres-table}
params$outres %>% 
  filter(sampleID == params$sample_id) %>%
  head(10)
```

```{r frares-table}
params$frares %>% 
  filter(sampleID == params$sample_id) %>%
  head(10)
```

```{r OUTRIDER-volcplot, fig.height=4, fig.width=6}
OUTRIDER::plotVolcano(
  params$outres,
  sampleID = params$sample_id,
  xaxis = "zscore",
  label = "aberrant",
  basePlot = TRUE
)
```

```{r frares-volcano, fig.height=4, fig.width=6}
FRASER::plotVolcano(
  params$frares,
  sampleID = params$sample_id,
  type = "jaccard",
  label = "aberrant"
)
```
